async function signQrToken(secret, customerId, merchantId, ttlSec = 60) {
    const { SignJWT } = await getJose();
    const now = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000);
    const jti = `${customerId}:${now}:${(0, crypto_1.randomUUID)()}`;
    const kid = config.getQrJwtKid();
    return await new SignJWT({ sub: customerId, t: 'qr' })
        .setProtectedHeader({ alg: 'HS256', typ: 'JWT', ...(kid ? { kid } : {}) })
        .setIssuedAt(now)
        .setExpirationTime(now + ttlSec)
        .setJti(jti)
        .setAudience(merchantId || 'any')
        .sign(ENC.encode(secret));
}
async function verifyQrToken(secret, token) {
    const { jwtVerify } = await getJose();
    const verifyWith = (sec) => jwtVerify(token, ENC.encode(sec), {
        algorithms: ['HS256'],
        clockTolerance: 5,
    });
    let payload;
    try {
        ({ payload } = await verifyWith(secret));
    }
    catch (e) {
        const next = config.getQrJwtSecretNext();
        Iif (!next)
            throw e;
        ({ payload } = await verifyWith(next));
    }
    const iat = Number(payload.iat);
    const exp = Number(payload.exp);
    Iif (!payload.sub ||
        !payload.jti ||
        !Number.isFinite(exp) ||
        !Number.isFinite(iat))
        throw new Error('Bad QR token');
    const aud = (Array.isArray(payload.aud) ? payload.aud[0] : payload.aud);
    return {
        customerId: String(payload.sub),
        merchantAud: aud,
        jti: String(payload.jti),
        iat,
        exp,
    };
}
function looksLikeJwt(s) {
    return typeof s === 'string' && s.split('.').length === 3;
}
